citations.narrative:
The facility has not performed or documented an annual review of their contingency plan. The last review was performed
in July 2023. Contingency plans must be in place and reviewed annually to ensure it adequately addresses the criteria
listed in paragraph (a) of this section and is still relevant to the facility and animals. The plan must provide for the humane
handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. Correct
by 26 December 2024 by reviewing the facility's contingency plan at least once a year and by maintaining documentation
of the review.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility has not performed or documented an annual review of their contingency plan. The last review was performed 
in July 2023. Contingency plans must be in place and reviewed annually to ensure it adequately addresses the criteria 
listed in paragraph (a) of this section and is still relevant to the facility and animals. The plan must provide for the humane 
handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. Correct 
by 26 December 2024 by reviewing the facility's contingency plan at least once a year and by maintaining documentation 
of the review. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
